privacy: Terms of Service Privacy Policy Your Privacy Choices
creatInfor: For more information about Character creation, see
creatFirstTips: The name can include first and last names.
grttingTips: What would they say to introduce themselves? For example, 'Albert Einstein' could say: 'Hello I am Albert Einstein. I was born in March 14, 1879, and I conceived of the theory of special relativity and general relativity.'
enable: Enable image generation for this Character.
visibiltyTitle: Who is allowed to talk to them?
link: Anyone with the link can chat
avatarTips: You can either create an image from text or upload an image.
roomTips: examples: Lincoln-Einstein, Music Lovers, Sci-Fi discuss.
addTips: Please enter the names or ids of the characters you want to add to this room. Note: Only the top 5000 public characters are available for now.
topicTips: What should happen in this room. Characters will try to follow it. Examples: Play by play superhero battle, Discuss the latest episode of Game of Thrones.
